item.title: Telluride Awards Analysis: ‘Hamnet,’ ‘Sentimental Value’ Join ‘Sinners’ Atop List of Oscar Frontrunners
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter’s executive editor of awards coverage offers his biggest takeaways from another Labor Day weekend in the Rockies.
